title: How to Compost at Home
content: Simple steps for home composting, including separating wet and dry waste and maintaining moisture.
author: user@example.com

title: Save Water by Reusing Rinse Water
content: Collect leftover water from washing vegetables to use in gardening.
author: naturelover@example.com

title: Grow Your Own Herbs
content: Start with easy herbs like basil and mint to reduce store-bought packaging waste.
author: ecohero@example.com

title: Carry a Reusable Kit Everywhere
content: Keep a reusable bottle, metal straw, and cloth bag in your backpack to avoid single-use items.
author: saver@example.com

title: Reduce Electricity with Natural Light
content: Open your windows and curtains during the day to reduce artificial lighting usage.
author: lightwise@example.com

title: Donate Old Clothes Instead of Throwing Away
content: Give gently used clothes to charities and community centers to reduce textile waste.
author: clothcare@example.com
